discussion_comments.comment_body: @copilot remove this and use the existing https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-net/blob/main/eng/pipelines/templates/steps/install-dotnet.yml

  - name: LINUXPOOL
    value: azsdk-pool-mms-ubuntu-2004-general
    value: azsdk-pool
  - name: WINDOWSPOOL

  - name: LINUXVMIMAGE
    value: azsdk-pool-mms-ubuntu-2004-1espt
    value: ubuntu-24.04
  - name: LINUXNEXTVMIMAGE
    value: ubuntu-22.04
  - name: WINDOWSVMIMAGE

discussion_comments.comment_body: @copilot anywhere you see a `vmImage:` convert it to a demand using `demand: $(LinuxImageDemand)` and make sure the job or stage is including the variables template `/eng/pipelines/templates/variables/image.yml` so we can use the variables in there. Also update the pool.name to use the correct variable from image.yml

discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -10,7 +10,7 @@ pr:
       - eng/CredScanSuppression.json

-  name: azsdk-pool-mms-win-2022-general
+  name: azsdk-pool
   vmImage: windows-2022
discussion_comments.comment_body: @copilot Undo the changes for the MacImageDemand as mac doesn't use demands.
